t: Hawaiian Macadamia Nut Company

t: Hamakua Macadamia Nut Co. – Made in Hawaii
s: Hamakua Macadamia Co. processes only 100% Hawaiian Macadamia Nuts. Hamakua obtains its crop by purchasing from over one hundred independent local farmers as well as their own farms. When you buy our products you are supporting local workers from the factory to the farm.
